file_content.text: General Ortol? Anyone? Whoever you are, listen--those missile batteries are all that's protecting Cademimu. You can't take control from me!
This is Imperial fleet command. Planetary defenses are disengaging--and we've got the governor's shuttle on scanners. We'll take it from here.
This is Republic fleet command. Looks like the missile batteries are disengaged, and the governor's shuttle just became vulnerable. Leave the cleanup to us.
General Ortol, report! What is the status of the intruders? Report!
This is General Ortol to the intruders. The governor may be cowering in his bunker, but we will do our job. You won't get any further.
This is General Ortol to all forces--the command center is under attack! Do not let the enemy take control of the missile batteries.
My people, do not listen to the lies on the HoloNet. There are no riots in the Mercantile District, and the missile batteries are perfectly safe.
Fellow citizens. Some of you have questioned the makeup of the Cademiman Guard--you ask "Why have we recruited offworlders?"
But I say if a man like General Ortol wants to fight for our planet, it would be selfish to deny him that privilege.
My fellow citizens. The coming days will be difficult--you will hear lies about civil unrest, about attacks on our soil.
But our world is protected--not just by our arsenal, but the Cademiman Guard patrols the streets to keep you safe.
